references.paper_title: Junction tree variational autoencoder for molecular graph generation
references.reason: This paper introduces a novel approach for molecular graph generation using a variational autoencoder, which is a foundational technique for many subsequent generative models in the field.

references.paper_title: Molecular de-novo design through deep reinforcement learning
references.reason: This paper is among the first to successfully apply deep reinforcement learning to molecular design, significantly advancing the field and inspiring numerous follow-up studies.

references.paper_title: A graph-based genetic algorithm and generative model/monte carlo tree search for the exploration of chemical space
references.reason: This paper introduces a graph-based genetic algorithm for molecule generation, which is a widely used method in the field due to its ability to explore chemical space efficiently.

references.paper_title: Exploring chemical space with score-based out-of-distribution generation
references.reason: This paper proposes a novel score-based generative model for exploring chemical space, a technique that is highly relevant to the current work and demonstrates improved performance on similar tasks.
This paper introduces the retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) framework for molecular generation, which is the core idea behind the proposed f-RAG model.
